cards.html:
Nintendo Switch owners have been waiting a long time for the critically acclaimed Battle Chasers Nightwar and it’s finally on the horizon.

The THQ Nordic RPG is set to release on May 15th for $39.99USD/$59.95AUD, and we have 11 minutes of footage of the game running on a Switch (Courtesy of MyGamingBoulevard):

Will you be picking up Battle Chasers Nightwar on the Switch in just under two weeks? Let us know in the comments below…

 

Also, why not give us a like on Facebook and follow us on Twitter @switchaboonews? And did you know that Nintendo have a new president? Read about it by clicking here.
